 __dont_treat_as_error__ 3ee204634754be100b315003846d4346 admin 2025-10-06 00:37:35 6205c0274754be100b315003846d438a 0 admin 2025-10-06 00:37:35 var__m_sys_hub_action_output_3ee204634754be100b315003846d4346
 3ee204634754be100b315003846d4346 121a59dd-a534-4cdd-8537-e8f987a4591e 1 1
106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2025-10-06 00:37:34 5205c0274754be100b315003846d4339 4 b812ceb69337a210633378917cba10bc admin 2025-10-06 01:01:09 sys_hub_step_instance 5205c0274754be100b315003846d4339 600 sys_variable_value admin 2025-10-06 00:37:35 5605c0274754be100b315003846d4372 3 admin 2025-10-06 01:01:09 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { /** * Calculates weekly transportation rate based on distance and sibling discount. * * Rules: * - Base flat rate = $65/week for up to 3 miles * - Additional $5 per mile beyond 3 miles * - 10% sibling discount applies to additional riders (not the first) * - Adds total riders and average weekly rate per rider */ // Parse inputs const distance = parseFloat(inputs.distance); const siblings = parseInt(inputs.additionalRiders || 0, 10); // Validate inputs if (isNaN(distance) || distance < 0) { outputs.error = "Invalid distance input."; return; } if (isNaN(siblings) || siblings < 0) { outputs.error = "Invalid siblings input."; return; } // Constants const BASE_RATE = 65; const EXTRA_MILE_RATE = 5; const SIBLING_DISCOUNT = 0.1; // 10% // Compute rate const extraMiles = Math.max(0, distance - 3); const extraCharge = extraMiles * EXTRA_MILE_RATE; const weeklyRate = BASE_RATE + extraCharge; // Apply sibling discount (first rider full, others 10% off) const siblingRate = weeklyRate * (1 - SIBLING_DISCOUNT); const totalCost = weeklyRate + (siblingRate * siblings); // New calculations const totalRiders = siblings + 1; const averageWeeklyRate = totalCost / totalRiders; // Set outputs outputs.distance = distance.toFixed(2); outputs.siblings = siblings; outputs.total_riders = totalRiders; outputs.weeklyRate = weeklyRate.toFixed(2); outputs.totalcost = totalCost.toFixed(2); outputs.average_weekly_rate = averageWeeklyRate.toFixed(2); })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b sys_hub_step_instance 5205c0274754be100b315003846d4339 400 sys_variable_value admin 2025-10-06 00:37:35 9205c0274754be100b315003846d4372 0 admin 2025-10-06 00:37:35 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 additionalRiders 5205c0274754be100b315003846d4339 admin 2025-10-06 00:59:01 54f904eb4754be100b315003846d430e 0 admin 2025-10-06 00:59:01 var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_5205c0274754be100b315003846d4339

 332b046f4754be100b315003846d4373 121a59dd-a534-4cdd-8537-e8f987a4591e 1 1
106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 372b046f4754be100b315003846d4391 1 b812ceb69337a210633378917cba10bc admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 sys_hub_step_instance 372b046f4754be100b315003846d4391 400 sys_variable_value admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 3b2b046f4754be100b315003846d43be 0 admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 sys_hub_step_instance 372b046f4754be100b315003846d4391 600 sys_variable_value admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 fb2b046f4754be100b315003846d43be 0 admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { /** * Calculates weekly transportation rate based on distance and sibling discount. * * Rules: * - Base flat rate = $65/week for up to 3 miles * - Additional $5 per mile beyond 3 miles * - 10% sibling discount applies to additional riders (not the first) * - Adds total riders and average weekly rate per rider */ // Parse inputs const distance = parseFloat(inputs.distance); const siblings = parseInt(inputs.additionalRiders || 0, 10); // Validate inputs if (isNaN(distance) || distance < 0) { outputs.error = "Invalid distance input."; return; } if (isNaN(siblings) || siblings < 0) { outputs.error = "Invalid siblings input."; return; } // Constants const BASE_RATE = 65; const EXTRA_MILE_RATE = 5; const SIBLING_DISCOUNT = 0.1; // 10% // Compute rate const extraMiles = Math.max(0, distance - 3); const extraCharge = extraMiles * EXTRA_MILE_RATE; const weeklyRate = BASE_RATE + extraCharge; // Apply sibling discount (first rider full, others 10% off) const siblingRate = weeklyRate * (1 - SIBLING_DISCOUNT); const totalCost = weeklyRate + (siblingRate * siblings); // New calculations const totalRiders = siblings + 1; const averageWeeklyRate = totalCost / totalRiders; // Set outputs outputs.distance = distance.toFixed(2); outputs.siblings = siblings; outputs.total_riders = totalRiders; outputs.weeklyRate = weeklyRate.toFixed(2); outputs.totalcost = totalCost.toFixed(2); outputs.average_weekly_rate = averageWeeklyRate.toFixed(2); })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b additionalRiders 372b046f4754be100b315003846d4391 admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 f72b046f4754be100b315003846d43bf 0 admin 2025-10-06 01:04:26 var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_372b046f4754be100b315003846d4391
